title: TFR Ep. 611: Jurassic World: Dominion, RRR, Who Dat?!?
description:
This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt take one last ride around the park with ‘Jurassic World: Dominion’.  Is this a fitting send off or proof that this franchise should have remained extinct?  Then it’s on to discuss ‘Rise Roar Revolt’ or ‘RRR’, the Tollywood action film that was a smash hit in India and is taking the rest of the world by storm. Are we going to have another example of Chris gushing over the new hotness du jour with Matt not seeing what the big deal is or vice versa? Will our hosts do what they usually do and agree? Listen on to find out!  There’s the suspenseful rundown of the big Physical Media Picks of the Week, featuring straight to dvd and streaming picks of the week then we’ll wrap up the show with everyone’s reference to the 2010 New Orleans Saints, Who Dat?!?  Featuring appearances by Greta Gerwig, Todd Phillips, Matt Reeves, and more!

00:00-24:39: Intro/Jurassic World: Dominion

24:40-38:37: Physical Media Picks

38:38-56:04: RRR

56:05-1:15:12: Who Dat?!?

1:15:13-1:16:26: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey
